text: Arau sihamtaka ami barata gotrata bibhakta karaicho. Muchara sampradaye yetiya te'omra ocarata pani bicaraile, tetiya ami te'omra prati ahi praerana karailo, ‘tomara lakhutidalerae silata aghata karaa’; phalata tara paraa barata jharnara utpatti ha’la. Pratyeka gotra'i nija nija pani khoraa sthana nirnaya karai la’le. Arau ami meghara dbaraa sihamtara oparata cham karai dichilo arau sihamtara oparata ami manna arau chalaraa aratirna karaichilo. (Kaichilo) ‘tomalokaka yi jiraika dana karaicho tara paraa paraitra bastu khoraa’. Sihamte amara prati kono an'yaya karaa nachila, baram sihamte nije'i nijara ksati sadhana karaiche
